column2: "Na David baa ɔsɔfo Ahimelek nkyɛn wɔ Nob: na Ahimelek dze ahopopo behyiaa David kwan
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo nko nam
column5: na nyimpa biara nnka wo ho yi?"
Mma nyimpa biara nnhu edwuma a morosoma wo wɔ ho yi
column6: na dza mahyɛ wo no ho biribiara: na mberantsɛ no so masoma hɔn wɔ beebi."

column3: ebɛnadze na ɔwɔ wo nsamu? Ma me boodoo ntɔwmu enum
column4: anaa biribiara a ɔwɔ hɔ sesei."
Boodoo hun biara nnyi me nsamu
column5: na boodoo krɔnkrɔn na ɔwɔ hɔ; sɛ mberantsɛ no esie hɔnho wɔ mbaa ho dze a."

column4: Ampaara bɛyɛ ha nda ebiasa yi yɛnnkɔr mbaa nkyɛn; aber a misii mu no na mberantsɛ no hɔn biribiara ho tsew
column5: kaansa ɔyɛ kwasafo akwantu mpo a; na ankantam ndɛ mbom na hɔn biribiara ho nnkɛtsew?"

column2: "Nna ɔsɔfo no maa no boodoo krɔnkrɔn: nna boodoo biara nnyi hɔ dɛ Kyerɛ boodoo no a woyi no wɔ EWURADZE n'enyim
column3: na da a woyi no wɔdze boodoohyew kogu hɔ no."

column2: "Afei dɛm da no nna Saul no nkowaa mu nyimpa bi wɔ hɔ a woesianka no wɔ EWURADZE n'enyim: na ne dzin dze Doeg
column3: Edomnyi a ɔyɛ Saul no mbowahwɛfo mu otsitsir no a."
Ana peaa anaa afona biara nnyi wo nsamu wɔ ha
column4: na ɔhen n'edwuma no wɔregye no ntsɛm ntsi
column5: mammfa m'afona na m'akodze so mammba."

column4: Filistianyi Goliat no a ikum no wɔ Ela ɔbɔn mu no n'afona no
column5: ɔno na wɔakyekyer no wɔ tam mu wɔ asɔfontar no n'ekyir hɔ no: sɛ ebɛfa ɔno a
column6: fa: na biara nnyi ha dɛ ɔno. Na David see dɛ

column3: na Saul no ho hu ntsi oguaan da no

column2: "Na Akis no nkowaa see no dɛ
column4: asaase no do hen no nye yi bi? Ana wɔanntow no ho ndwom wɔ asaw mu annse dɛ

column2: "Na David dze nsɛm yi siee n'akoma mu
"Na ɔsakyeer ne ndzeyɛe wɔ hɔn enyim
column3: na ɔyɛɛ noho dɛ nyia ɔabɔ dam wɔ hɔn nsamu
column4: na ɔwerɛwerɛɛw kuropon ano mbobow no ho
column5: na ɔmaa ne ntafi sinsiaan n'abɔdwesa mu."

column2: "Nna Akis see no nkowaa no dɛ
column4: hom ehu dɛ ɔbarimba yi ɔabɔ dam: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom dze no brɛ me yi?"

column2: "Ana mihia abɔdamfo na hom dze oyi aba dɛ ɔmbɛyɛ abɔdamdze wɔ m'enyim yi? Ma aso oyi ɔmbra me fie?"
